评论概述: Best Sunglasses I've ever bought on Amazon
评论详情: I am extremely impressed with what you get for this price. The sunglasses are very tasteful and of great quality. They feel high end and came with a thick satin bag, which I didn't expect! The temples feel deliberately designed to be more comfortable, and they slide into place beautifully. I've bought a lot of affordable sunglasses over the years, but never any quite like this. I also never leave Amazon reviews, but felt this one was worth it. I'll definitely be repurchasing!

评论概述: Best pair of sunglasses without a prescription, although.....
评论详情: I've now owned two pairs of glasses. At almost $20 a pop after taxes, I don't know just yet that I will be willing to purchase a third pair. I absolutely love them, just when I least expect it, an arm will just fall off. I live in Florida the sunshine state literally, their perfect for sunny days, and polarize like a gem. But I'm no Ray Ban owner and this are beautifully a statement piece in my life, I just absolutely hate that I can't even keep em for than a year. Please reinforce the little arms on the shades. The screws aren't falling out. The little metal that folds out that arms of the frames is what is breaking. And keep me posted I'd love to own these again.

评论概述: One of the best Amazon purchases I've made!!!
评论详情: I am so pleased with these glasses that I had to write a review.  I hadn't worn sunglasses since the early 90s.  They were just one more thing I had to keep track of.  Now that I'm older and looking for ways to care for my skin, I decided to go back to wearing sunglasses.  I really like the cat eye shape so I specifically searched for those.  I added a bunch to my wish list, including these, to try out and since these were the most affordable ones, I purchased these first.  I had very low expectations that they would look like they did online but I was wrong.  THESE LOOK FABULOUS!!!  They are they perfect weight, they don't scuff easily and they come with a pouch and polishing cloth.  Within two weeks of wearing them, I had already purchased six more sets for all of my purses and my cars.  I don't ever want to be without these!!
